name: Thunder Walk
description:
Description

Who would have thought it would rain that much in the middle of the summer?

Ellie just got caught in the middle of the storm while getting back home. 

Equipped with her favorite umbrella, windbreaker and boots, help her dodge the thunders while getting back home!

Control

Keyboard Arrows Left and Right

The Team Art by : MEDELICE Joy Programmation by : MENAL FUCHS Raphael PUTEGNAT Paul
